title: Wireless System Test Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for taking on big challenges? Do you love pushing the limits of what's considered feasible? As part of our Wireless Hardware group, you'll be responsible for bringing groundbreaking wireless connectivity to the world. On this team, you'll help improve the performance of our products through innovative system-on-chip designs. You and your team will build platform architecture that paves the way for all-new experiences, including the ones that allow people to take advantage of our innovations in sensor technology. Together, our goal is to ensure nothing stands in the way of our customers' connections with their devices. Join us and help build world-renowned wireless systems that connect customers to their world like never before.
description: In this technical role, you will be responsible for test execution, reporting, debug, and automation development on powerful wireless SoC products! You will develop the test plans, carry out test campaigns, generate reports and triage issues within the wireless silicon design group on the radio and PHY. This will include debugging and extending the bringup infrastructure as well as the characterization, regression, and reporting framework.
key_qualifications: This is an individual technical contributor role that requires industry experience in testing of wireless silicon within wireless communication systems. Understanding of communication theory and key metrics like EVM and sensitivity. Experience using and understanding of the theory of operation of lab equipment (spectrum analyzer, signal generator, network analyzer, power meter). Experience debugging test automation including equipment drivers, debug tools, automation scripts, database interfaces, and reporting tools. Knowledge in existing wireless communication protocols: LTE/WCDMA/GSM, 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax/be, 802.11ad/ay or Bluetooth/BLE. Experience completing and debugging test software in Python, Matlab, and/or C/C++.
education_experience: Minimum qualification is BS + 0 years of relevant experience.
